message.content:
We start by gathering the numbers from each of the statements (all ending figures are from 2024‑02‑01):

1. Operating Cash Flow to Current Liabilities Ratio 
 • Operating Cash Flow (from the cash flow statement) = –2,419,019.09  
 • Total Current Liabilities (from the balance sheet) = 5,515,978.61  
  Ratio = –2,419,019.09 / 5,515,978.61 ≈ –0.44

2. Debt to Equity Ratio 
 • Total Liabilities: In this balance sheet the only liabilities shown are current liabilities = 5,515,978.61  
 • Total Owner's Equity (end) = 16,146,127.58  
  Ratio = 5,515,978.61 / 16,146,127.58 ≈ 0.34

3. Total Asset Turnover Ratio 
 • Total Revenue (from the income statement) = 863,371.65  
 • Total Assets (end) = 21,662,106.19  
  Ratio = 863,371.65 / 21,662,106.19 ≈ 0.04

4. Quick Ratio 
 Quick assets include Cash on Hand, Bank Deposits, Interest Receivable, and Accounts Receivable.  
 • Cash on Hand: 2,882,590.91  
 • Bank Deposits: 2,698,390.00  
 • Interest Receivable: 9,066.78  
 • Accounts Receivable: 330,748.44  
  Sum of Quick Assets = 2,882,590.91 + 2,698,390.00 + 9,066.78 + 330,748.44 = 5,920,796.13  
 Current Liabilities = 5,515,978.61  
  Quick Ratio = 5,920,796.13 / 5,515,978.61 ≈ 1.07

5. Operating Cash Flow Ratio 
 This is the same calculation as in step (1):  
  Ratio = –2,419,019.09 / 5,515,978.61 ≈ –0.44

6. Return on Equity (ROE) 
 We use the average owner’s equity.  
 • Beginning Owner’s Equity = 16,000,000.00  
 • Ending Owner’s Equity = 16,146,127.58  
  Average Owner’s Equity = (16,000,000.00 + 16,146,127.58) / 2 = 16,073,063.79  
 Net Profit (from the income statement) = 146,127.58  
  ROE = 146,127.58 / 16,073,063.79 ≈ 0.0091, or 0.91%

7. Accounts Receivable Turnover Ratio 
 We assume that all sales are on credit. The average accounts receivable is used.  
 • Beginning Accounts Receivable = 0.00  
 • Ending Accounts Receivable = 330,748.44  
  Average Accounts Receivable = (0 + 330,748.44) / 2 = 165,374.22  
 Total Revenue = 863,371.65  
  Ratio = 863,371.65 / 165,374.22 ≈ 5.22

Putting it all together in the required JSON format:

{
  "solution": {
    "operating cash flow to current liabilities ratio": "-0.44",
    "Debt to Equity Ratio": "0.34",
    "Total Asset Turnover Ratio": "0.04",
    "Quick Ratio": "1.07",
    "Operating Cash Flow Ratio": "-0.44",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "0.91%",
    "Accounts Receivable Turnover Ratio": "5.22"
  }
}
